entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local amount 2 cm.
